summary_md: Spain, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 29,193 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.77% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), an unemployment rate of 11.39% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), and an average life expectancy of 83.88 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN). The country's internet user penetration stands at 95.40% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), and its share of global exports is 37.29% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Spain's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 29,193 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and a share of global exports at 37.29% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.health_env_md: Spain's average life expectancy is 83.88 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), indicating a healthy environment.
